docs.title: zebrafish-toxicology-atlas-schema
docs.text:
Schema to represent metadata associated with the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas

URI: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/zebrafish-toxicology-atlas-schema

Name: zebrafish-toxicology-atlas-schema

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Entity The base class for all entities in the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas Schema ChemicalEntity A chemical compound used as a toxicant in the study Experiment An experiment within a study ExposureEvent An instance of a toxicological exposure event in the study ExposureExperiment An experiment exposing fish to chemical stressors Fish A representation of the zebrafish used in the toxicology study Image An image associated with a phenotype observation Phenotype A phenotype observed in the fish as a result of exposure PhenotypeObservation An observation of phenotypes resulting from exposure experiments Regimen The regimen of exposure events Stressor A chemical stressor used in exposure experiments Study A toxicology study containing experiments QuantityValue A value of an attribute that is quantitative and measurable, expressed as a c...

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description additional_exposure_conditions Additional exposure conditions cas_id CAS identifier for the chemical chebi_id CHEBI identifier for the chemical chemical Chemical identifier (CHEBI, CAS, or UUID) chemical_name Name of the chemical comments Additional comments contributor The contributors of the study control Whether this is a control observation dose The dose of the chemical experiment The experiments in this study exposure_end_stage The developmental stage at exposure end exposure_event The exposure events in this experiment exposure_experiment The exposure experiments for this observation exposure_regimen_type The type of exposure regimen (e exposure_start_stage The developmental stage at exposure start exposure_type The exposure type id image Images associated with this observation individual_exposure_duration Individual exposure duration interval_between_exposures Interval between individual exposures lab The lab where the experiment originated magnification The magnification of the image manufacturer The manufacturer of the chemical name Name or label of an entity number_of_repeats Number of repeats in the regimen numeric_value The numeric value of the quantity value phenotype The phenotype observed phenotype_observation The phenotype observations from this experiment phenotype_term_id The phenotype ontology term identifier prevalence The prevalence of the phenotype publication The publication identifier (e rearing_condition_comments Comments about rearing conditions regimen The regimen for the exposure resolution The resolution of the image route The route of exposure scale_bar Scale bar information severity The severity of the phenotype stage The developmental stage standard_rearing_conditions Whether standard rearing conditions were used stressor_chemical The stressor chemicals used subject The fish subject of the exposure experiment synonym time_between_first_and_last_exposure Time between first and last individual exposure unit The unit of the quantity value uuid UUID identifier vehicle The vehicles used in the exposure

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description ExposureRegimenTypeEnum An enumeration of exposure regimen types ExposureRouteEnum An enumeration of exposure routes derived from the EXO ontology ExposureTypeEnum An enumeration of exposure types derived from the ECTO ontology SeverityEnum An enumeration of severity levels for phenotypes VehicleEnumeration An enumeration of vehicles used in exposures

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Class: Entity
docs.text:
The base class for all entities in the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas Schema.

  • NOTE: this is an abstract class and should not be instantiated directly

URI: zebrafish_toxicology_atlas_schema:Entity

 classDiagram
    class Entity
    click Entity href "../Entity/"
      Entity <|-- Study
        click Study href "../Study/"
      Entity <|-- Experiment
        click Experiment href "../Experiment/"
      Entity <|-- PhenotypeObservation
        click PhenotypeObservation href "../PhenotypeObservation/"
      Entity <|-- Phenotype
        click Phenotype href "../Phenotype/"
      Entity <|-- ExposureExperiment
        click ExposureExperiment href "../ExposureExperiment/"
      Entity <|-- ExposureEvent
        click ExposureEvent href "../ExposureEvent/"
      Entity <|-- Regimen
        click Regimen href "../Regimen/"
      Entity <|-- Stressor
        click Stressor href "../Stressor/"
      Entity <|-- ChemicalEntity
        click ChemicalEntity href "../ChemicalEntity/"
      Entity <|-- Image
        click Image href "../Image/"
      Entity <|-- Fish
        click Fish href "../Fish/"

      Entity : uuid

docs.title: Class: ExposureEvent

      ExposureEvent : exposure_end_stage

      ExposureEvent : exposure_start_stage

        ExposureEvent --> "0..1" ExposureTypeEnum : exposure_type
        click ExposureTypeEnum href "../ExposureTypeEnum/"



      ExposureEvent : regimen





        ExposureEvent --> "0..1" Regimen : regimen
        click Regimen href "../Regimen/"



      ExposureEvent : route





        ExposureEvent --> "0..1" ExposureRouteEnum : route
        click ExposureRouteEnum href "../ExposureRouteEnum/"

        click VehicleEnumeration href "../VehicleEnumeration/"

docs.title: Schema Entity-Relationship Diagram
docs.text:
This diagram shows the entity-relationship model of the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas Schema.

erDiagram
ChemicalEntity {
    uriorcurie chebi_id  
    string cas_id  
    string chemical_name  
    string uuid  
    stringList synonym  
}
Entity {
    string uuid  
}
Experiment {
    boolean control  
    string uuid  
}
ExposureEvent {
    VehicleEnumerationList vehicle  
    ExposureRouteEnum route  
    uriorcurie exposure_start_stage  
    uriorcurie exposure_end_stage  
    string comments  
    ExposureTypeEnum exposure_type  
    string additional_exposure_conditions  
    string uuid  
}
ExposureExperiment {
    boolean standard_rearing_conditions  
    string rearing_condition_comments  
    string uuid  
}
Fish {
    string name  
    uriorcurie id  
    string uuid  
}
Image {
    string uuid  
    string magnification  
    string resolution  
    string scale_bar  
}
Phenotype {
    uriorcurie stage  
    SeverityEnum severity  
    uriorcurie phenotype_term_id  
    string uuid  
}
PhenotypeObservation {
    boolean control  
    string uuid  
}
QuantityValue {
    string unit  
    string numeric_value  
}
Regimen {
    ExposureRegimenTypeEnum exposure_regimen_type  
    integer number_of_repeats  
    string uuid  
}
Stressor {
    string manufacturer  
    string comments  
    string uuid  
}
Study {
    string publication  
    uriorcurieList contributor  
    uriorcurie lab  
    string uuid  
}

Experiment ||--}o PhenotypeObservation : "phenotype_observation"
ExposureEvent ||--|o Regimen : "regimen"
ExposureEvent ||--}o Stressor : "stressor_chemical"
ExposureExperiment ||--|o Fish : "subject"
ExposureExperiment ||--}o ExposureEvent : "exposure_event"
Phenotype ||--|o QuantityValue : "prevalence"
PhenotypeObservation ||--|o ExposureExperiment : "exposure_experiment"
PhenotypeObservation ||--}o Image : "image"
PhenotypeObservation ||--}o Phenotype : "phenotype"
Regimen ||--|o QuantityValue : "individual_exposure_duration"
Regimen ||--|o QuantityValue : "interval_between_exposures"
Regimen ||--|o QuantityValue : "time_between_first_and_last_exposure"
Stressor ||--|| ChemicalEntity : "chemical"
Stressor ||--|| QuantityValue : "dose"
Study ||--}o Experiment : "experiment"
